flag_cal2_correction_cnf.description: Flag that activates the CAL2 corrections: Deactivated (false); Activated (true)

flag_uso_correction_cnf.description: Flag that activates the USO correction: Deactivated (false); Activated (true)

flag_cal1_corrections_cnf.description: Flag that activates the CAL1 corrections: Deactivated (false); Activated (true)

flag_cal1_intraburst_corrections_cnf.description: Flag that activates the CAL1 intraburst corrections: Deactivated (false); Activated (true)

flag_surface_focusing_cnf.description: Flag that activates the surface focussing: Deactivated (false); Activated (true)

surface_focusing_lat_cnf.description: Location of the surface focusing target (latitude)

surface_focusing_lon_cnf.description: Location of the surface focusing target (longitude)

surface_focusing_alt_cnf.description: Location of the surface focusing target (altitude)

flag_azimuth_processing_method_cnf.description: Flag that indicates the azimuth processing method: Surface dependant (0); Approximate (1); Exact (2)

flag_postphase_azimuth_processing_cnf.description: Flag that enables the post-phase azimuth processing: Deactivated (false); Activated (true)

flag_azimuth_windowing_method_cnf.description: Flag the sets the azimuth windowing method: Disabled ('none'); Boxcar ('boxcar'); Hamming ('hamming'); Hanning ('hanning')

azimuth_window_width_cnf.description: Width of Azimuth window (minimum value: 32, maximum value: 64)

flag_doppler_range_correction_cnf.description: Flag that activates the Doppler range correction in the geometry corrections: Deactivated (false); Activated (true)

flag_slant_range_correction_cnf.description: Flag that activates the slant range correction in the geometry corrections: Deactivated (false); Activated (true)

flag_window_delay_alignment_method_cnf.description: Flag to indicate the window delay alignment method: Surface dependent (0); Beam max integrated power (1); Satellite position above surface (2); Look angle 0 (3); Doppler angle 0 (4)

flag_stack_masking_cnf.description: Flag that activates the Stack Masking algorithm: Activated (true); Deactivated (false)

flag_remove_doppler_ambiguities_cnf.description: Flag that indicates if the Doppler ambiguities will be removed: No (false); Yes (true)

flag_avoid_zeros_in_multilooking_cnf.description: Flag that indicates if the samples set to zero in the beams will be avoided when averaging in multi-looking: No (false); Yes (true)

flag_surface_weighting_cnf.description: Flag that activates the surface weighting: Deactivated (false); Activated (true)

flag_antenna_weighting_cnf.description: Flag that activates the antenna weighting: Deactivated (false); Activated (true)

zp_fact_range_cnf.description: Zero padding factor used during range compression
